attributes.action: stop dodgy financial institutions and tax evading businessmen from funding the tory party
attributes.additional_details: Mr Clegg wants to look into the unions funding of the Labour party. While the unions and the Labour party  are not perfect, they do try to represent the people.Can  we honestly say the same for the backers of the tories. If there is any doubts about the morality or legality of tory backers the public should be able to veto their party contributions
